arguments.value: Only the community owner can cha

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev Template curation contract of Nutbox.
 Every community can only deploy one curation pool
 The community DAO can reset the pool ratio from token mint and reset the recipient address(always be another contract)
 Everyone can claim reward from curation pool, the reward will mint to the recipient address
x

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the community owner can change recipient"

arguments.value: Only the community owner can change recipient

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the community owner can change recipient"
